sentences.sentence: It began in 2005, when Franklin Leonard was a development executive for Leonardo DiCaprio's production company, Appian Way.
sentences.translation: 这些开始于2005年，此时的富兰克林莱纳德是莱奥纳多迪卡普里奥制片公司“Appian way”的项目开发主管。

sentences.sentence: In another part of the state, a section of Route 66, paved by Appian Roadways more than four years ago, is still in good condition.
sentences.translation: 在同一州的另一个地区，四年多以前由Appian筑路公司修筑的66公路的一段现在依然状况良好。

sentences.sentence: Appian is a great historian of the Rome Empire. His viewpoint on fate, forming after his careful study on Roman history, has its duality.
sentences.translation: 阿庇安是罗马帝国早期杰出的历史学家，他结合历史形成了自己的命运观。
